content.rendered:
1. Author’s Name: Nahida Akter
Lecturer,CSE

  • Nahida Akter (Corresponding Author), Md. Bellal Hossain, Amran Hossain, Design & Performance Analysis of 10 stage Voltage Doublers RF Energy Harvesting Circuit for Wireless Sensor Network, Journal of Communications Engineering and Networks (JCEN) 2014, available athttp://www.bowenpublishing.com/jcen/paperInfo.aspx?PaperID=15730

2. Author’s Name: Md.Mahabub Hasan Mousum
Lecturer, Aeronautical Engineering.

  • “Phase-field modeling of low carbon steel microstructure evolution – A review.” got accepted at ICMEIE-2015, Bangladesh.(On progress)
  • “Influence of hydrogen on engine emissions – a review”-(Available in http://www.academia.edu/8420628/)
  • ” Basic parameters related to diesel combustion and exhaust emissions “– (Available in http://www.academia.edu/8420569/)
